section.para: To post count tag totals (i.e., inventory counts) to the quantity on hand (QOH) for their respective item sites for an entire site, go to Inventory > Physical Inventory > Post Count Tags. The following screen will appear:
When posting count tags, you are presented with the following options:

note.para: If an item site was frozen when its count tag was created, then both the inventory count and the corresponding general ledger (G/L) transactions will use the count tag created (i.e., frozen) date when the count tag is posted. On the other hand, if the item site was not frozen, the inventory and G/L transactions will use the count tag posted date.
